message:
With all the recent news about SSL-related news (Cloudfare SSL-for-all, and today's SSL3 vulnerability), I'd like to get a better understanding of SSL, HTTPS, TLS, and all the other related acrynoms.
I want to know the difference between them, how they work, etc. I'm looking for a good resource (hopefully a video). Can you recommend any?

data.message: BTW, here's a good guide to today's SSL3 Poodle vulnerability https://zmap.io/sslv3/

and I was incredibly happy with the free SSL feature from Cloudflare :')
*بيجري يلغي الأوبشن ده بسرعه*
بس الحمد لله لحقو نفسهم وقامو لاغيين دعم الاصدار اللي فيه الثغرة :
https://blog.cloudflare.com/sslv3-support-disabled-by-default-due-to-vulnerability/
I will bring you Our Security Specialist here in this post :) Mohamed A. Baset Please Explain :)
